scripts.start: parcel serve client/client.ts client/static/comment.ts client/{demo,index}.html client/static/themes/{light,dark}.styl -d templates/web --port 5000 && go-bindata-assetfs -debug -pkg=static -o ./templates/static.go templates/web/... templates/manage/...
scripts.build: parcel build client/client.ts client/static/comment.ts client/index.html client/static/themes/{light,dark}.styl -d templates/web --experimental-scope-hoisting --no-content-hash && go-bindata-assetfs -nomemcopy -pkg=static -o ./templates/static.go templates/web/... templates/manage/...
